item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Codebuff (YC F24) – CLI tool that writes code for you (163 points | 131 comments)
2. Using Ghidra and Python to reverse engineer Ecco the Dolphin (297 points | 66 comments)
3. Functional ultrasound through the skull (68 points | 16 comments)
4. AI for real-time fusion plasma behavior prediction and manipulation (193 points | 97 comments)
5. Sustainable Web Interest Group Is Formed (70 points | 25 comments)
6. QNX is now free for anything non-commercial, plus there's an RPi image (347 points | 139 comments)
7. Mushroom Color Atlas (131 points | 18 comments)
8. Edge Scripting: Build and run applications at the edge (56 points | 26 comments)
9. Show HN: BemiDB – Postgres read replica optimized for analytics (120 points | 62 comments)
10. The Brothers Grimm: A Biography (34 points | 3 comments)
11. Toronto crypto company CEO kidnapped, held for $1M ransom before being released (56 points | 24 comments)
12. Imaging shapes of atomic nuclei in high-energy nuclear collisions (27 points | 2 comments)
13. Hyperlight: Virtual machine-based security for functions at scale (44 points | 11 comments)
14. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (148 points | 53 comments)
15. Show HN: Directional antenna alignment using phone motion sensors (9 points | 1 comment)
16. Five minutes of exercise a day could lower blood pressure (39 points | 13 comments)
17. Sega is delisting 60 classic games from Steam, so now's the time to grab them (37 points | 23 comments)
18. Excerpts from a conversation about personal information management (131 points | 61 comments)
19. Ultraprecise method of aligning 3D semiconductor chips invented (115 points | 12 comments)
20. The egg or the chicken? An ancient unicellular says egg (35 points | 61 comments)
21. Show HN: Draw.Audio – A musical sketchpad using the Web Audio API (6 points | 3 comments)
22. Linux Syscall Support (143 points | 87 comments)
23. Kagi Translate (177 points | 70 comments)
24. A counter-intuitive guide to better leadership (86 points | 25 comments)
25. Optery (YC W22) Is Hiring Product Managers and Full Stack Developer (Node.js) ( | hide)
26. Bird flu infections undetected (32 points | 38 comments)
27. Bluesky's at Protocol: Pros and Cons for Developers (50 points | 13 comments)
28. Automat (208 points | 74 comments)
29. Richard A. Cash, who saved millions from dehydration, has died (152 points | 40 comments)
30. URAvatar: Universal Relightable Gaussian Codec Avatars (96 points | 12 comments)
